CtaSection.title: The world's most private cloud storage
CtaSection.description: Protect the really important stuff with Internxt's secure, private, and encrypted cloud storage.

FeatureSection.title: Why choose Internxt to secure your files?
FeatureSection.description: Internxt puts you back in control of your privacy. Unlike traditional cloud storage, we ensure only you have the keys to your encrypted data. We take every step to ensure your information remains secure.

feature1.title: Zero-Knowledge Encryption
feature1.description: Internxt uses zero-knowledge encryption to ensure that only you have access to your files. We never store your encryption keys, so only you can access your data.

feature2.title: Enhanced Privacy
feature2.description: Our powerful encryption protects your data from unauthorized access. We never store passwords; all your data is encrypted in transit and at rest.

feature3.title: User Control
feature3.description: To protect you from data breaches, Internxt protects your data by making it inaccessible to third parties, including Internxt.

feature4.title: Cross-Platform Access
feature4.description: Work freely and access all your files across various devices and operating systems.

TestimonialsSection.title: What our users are saying about us

cards.name: Eva Williams
cards.review: Internxt is a convenient cloud storage service for privacy-conscious clients. It has a streamlined interface and a reliable support team, which makes it a great option for those who need to store their files securely.

cards.name: Cristian M.
cards.review: The best encrypted Dropbox alternative. Overall: We needed an alternative that allowed us to store client files and work (social media files) and as Internxt is GDPR friendly fit perfectly for us!

cards.name: Josep Carrizo
cards.review: I've been using Google Drive for several years, but I needed an alternative which granted me the privacy of my data. Something that Google or other well known platforms can't do. That's why I moved to Internxt.
